alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 14 at 8:36AM MDT until August 18 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 11 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures of 100 to 110 degrees below 2500 feet. Temperatures of 90 to 100 degrees above 2500 feet to 3500 feet. * WHERE...Southern Clearwater Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM Tuesday to 11 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
